      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(SpenSettingPenInfo settingInfo)
        Set the specified brush settings information. The UI is refreshed according to this value.

        Brush settings information must be not null. List pen supported is : WaterColorBrush, OilBrush3, BrushPen, Pencil3, Crayon2, AirBrushPen, Marker2 (in SDK version 5.0)

        Parameters:
        settingInfo - The Brush settings information object. SpenSettingPenInfo
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the info is null.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setPenInfoList

        public void setPenInfoList(List<SpenSettingPenInfo> list)
        set up the pen setting infomation list 

         ArrayList tempPenInfoList = new ArrayList();
 List mPenList = new ArrayList();

 mPenManager.getInfoList(mPenList);

 int penCount = mPenList.size();
 int penInfoCount = mPenInfoList.size();

 for (int i = 0; i < mPenList.size(); i++) {
 PenInfo penInfo = mPenList.get(i);

 SpenSettingPenInfo info = new SpenSettingPenInfo();
 info.alpha = mPen.getAlpha();
 info.color = -16777216;
 info.advancedSetting = "";
 info.isCurvable = true;
 info.name = penInfo.className;
 info.size = mPen.getSize();
 tempPenInfoList.add(info);

 mSettingViewInterface.setPenSettingInfo(info);

 }

 mPenSettingView.setPenInfoList(tempPenInfoList);
        Parameters:
        list - List The list of Pen settings infomation. SpenSettingPenInfo
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setPenDegree

        public boolean setPenDegree(int degree)
        Called when you want to change the direction of Pen. Note that it is only changed to the direction of the pen. (The size of view is not changed) Now degree value is possible 0 or 180.
        Parameters:
        degree -
        Returns:
        True that if it is possible to support rotation, false otherwise.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setSelectorDegree

        public boolean setSelectorDegree(int degree)
        Called when you want to change the direction of color selector Note that it is only changed to the direction of color selector (The size of view is not changed) degree value is possible 0 or 90.
        Parameters:
        degree -
        Returns:
        True that if it is possible to support rotation, false otherwise.
        Since:
        5.0.0
